implementation_summary: Implemented buffer reset detection logic for Issue #59. Added detectBufferReset() function that detects two scenarios: (1) buffer shrink when currentLineCount is significantly smaller than lastCapturedLine with BUFFER_RESET_TOLERANCE=25, and (2) session restart when lastCapturedLine > 50 and currentLineCount < 50. The savePendingAssistantResponse() function now uses this detection to reset the effective last captured line to 0 when a buffer reset is detected, allowing responses to be saved correctly after session restarts or buffer clears. Added 23 new tests for detectBufferReset unit tests and 8 integration tests for savePendingAssistantResponse buffer reset scenarios.

acceptance_criteria_status.buffer_shrink_save: PASS - Response saved correctly when buffer shrinks (1993->608 lines)
acceptance_criteria_status.session_restart_save: PASS - Response saved correctly when session restarts (500->30 lines)
acceptance_criteria_status.duplicate_prevention: PASS - Normal duplicate prevention logic maintained
acceptance_criteria_status.logging: PASS - Buffer reset detection logged with reason (shrink/restart)

message: TDD implementation completed for Issue #59. Buffer reset detection logic added to assistant-response-saver.ts. Coverage 95.65% (exceeds 80% target). All static analysis checks passed.
